trans-unit.source: Provides a WPF core-level base class for content elements.
trans-unit.target: 为内容元素提供 WPF 核心级基类。

trans-unit.source: Content elements are designed for flow-style presentation, using an intuitive markup-oriented layout model and a deliberately simple object model.
trans-unit.target: 内容元素设计用于流样式显示，它们使用面向标记的直观布局模型和精心设计的简单对象模型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> defines the following common content characteristics:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> 定义以下常见内容的特征：

trans-unit.source: Input: All <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes provide support for basic input capture from keyboard, mouse, drag-and-drop operations, stylus controls, and accelerators.
trans-unit.target: 输入： 所有<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>派生的类提供用于从键盘、 鼠标、 拖放操作、 触笔控件和快捷键的基本输入捕获的支持。

trans-unit.source: Focus: All <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes are potentially focusable.
trans-unit.target: 焦点： 所有<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>派生的类是能够获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: (However, the default focusable state for the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> base class is `false`.
trans-unit.target: (但是，默认焦点状态<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>基类是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to make a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> focusable, see <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A>.) In addition, this class contains [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that you can use for traversing the focus across related elements.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，如何使<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>可获得焦点，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A>。)此外，此类包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，你可将用于在相关元素中遍历焦点。

trans-unit.source: Events: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> includes events that are related to input and focus; it also includes events for changes in state.
trans-unit.target: 事件：<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>包括事件中与输入和焦点相关; 它还包括状态中的更改的事件。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> events are routed events.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>事件是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, routed events have both tunneling and bubbling routing strategies, raised as separate events in response to the same state or condition.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，路由的事件都具有隧道和冒泡路由策略，为同一个状态或条件的响应中不同的事件引发。

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> defines [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that can raise routed events and that can add or remove handlers to events.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]可引发路由事件以及可以添加或移除事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> shares many common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] with <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> 共享许多公共[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]与<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>。

trans-unit.source: These common [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] do not come from a shared class inheritance.
trans-unit.target: 这些公共[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]并非来自共享的类继承。

trans-unit.source: But they do share common naming, similar behavior, and similar internal implementation of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in each class.
trans-unit.target: 但它们共享公共命名、 类似的行为和类似内部实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]在每个类。

trans-unit.source: The similarity is because <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> are each classes that are an element base, although each has different intentions for its markup object model behavior.
trans-unit.target: 相似性是因为<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>和<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>是基，元素的每个类，尽管每个具有不同目的对其标记对象模型的行为。

trans-unit.source: In particular, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> descends from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>, which provides the lower-level graphics support for rendering a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> to a rectangular region within a composited window, whereas <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> defers rendering so that concepts more common to document scenarios, such as flow and wrapping, are more easily supported.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>递减自<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>，该属性提供较低级别图形支持呈现<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>合成窗口内的矩形区域而<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>延迟呈现，以便详细的概念更轻松地支持对文档的方案，例如流和自动换行，都通用的。

trans-unit.source: These two related classes also implement the common interfaces <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IAnimatable>.
trans-unit.target: 这两个相关类还实现公共接口<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.IAnimatable>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> class does not yet define all aspects of a complete content element for flow-style presentation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />类未尚未定义流样式显示的完整内容元素的所有方面。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> is an immediately derived class of <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 是的一个立即派生的类<see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> includes a more complete set of additional members that support rendering a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> within a content host and using the WPF framework-level layout system.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 包括一组更为完整的其他成员以支持呈现<see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />内容主机和使用 WPF 框架级别布局系统中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的路由事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 对处理程序实现的引用。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the.routed event to be handled.
trans-unit.target: 要处理的路由事件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 对处理程序实现的引用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; <see langword="false" /> to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则将按以下方式注册处理程序：即使路由事件在其事件数据中标记为已处理，也会调用处理程序；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使用默认条件注册处理程序，即当路由事件被标记为已处理时，将不调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not routinely ask to rehandle a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 请勿定期请求重新处理路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的路由事件添加路由事件处理程序，并将该处理程序添加到当前元素的处理程序集合中。

trans-unit.source: Specify <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> as <see langword="true" /> to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.
trans-unit.target: 将 <paramref name="handledEventsToo" /> 指定为 <see langword="true" />，可为已标记为由事件路由中的其他元素处理的路由事件调用所提供的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task.
trans-unit.target: 处理低级别的输入的事件中切实可行的方法是一个复杂的任务。

trans-unit.source: Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event.
trans-unit.target: 许多控件实现的行为其中特定事件被标记为已处理，而替换为另一个更直观的事件。

trans-unit.source: Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，控制为已处理某个设计意图要求这样做是否只是标注平台输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情况下，这些设计意图可能不是你的输入事件的特定处理的要求。

trans-unit.source: It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 它为这些方案是该注册处理程序替换`handledEventsToo`作为`true`适合。

trans-unit.source: But you should not do this routinely.
trans-unit.target: 但你不应该这样做例行。

trans-unit.source: Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic.
trans-unit.target: 调用以响应所有事件处理程序，即使处理将使你自己的应用程序事件处理逻辑。

trans-unit.source: You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial.
trans-unit.target: 如果处理程序逻辑是庞大，可能会看到导致性能降低。

trans-unit.source: You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic.
trans-unit.target: 你应保留使用附加的已处理事件的情况下，你已检测到在开发过程中，某些控件正在处理你仍想要使用应用程序逻辑处理的事件的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative.
trans-unit.target: 避免处理的某些事件控件组合的行为的类的另一种方法是使用该事件的预览版的替代项。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown> instead.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown>标记为已处理类处理，你可能能够为添加处理程序<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown>相反。

trans-unit.source: You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception.
trans-unit.target: 可以将同一事件的同一处理程序添加多次而不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该处理程序实际调用的多次处理该事件时。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请考虑如何此行为可能会产生的负面影响，应考虑在处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.
trans-unit.target: 通常使用此方法来提供的"添加"访问器实现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自定义的路由事件的访问模式。

trans-unit.source: The following example implements a handler invoked on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized> event on a page that attaches a defined handler to one of the named elements on the page using `handledEventsToo` `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实现一个处理程序调用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Initialized>将定义处理程序附加到一个页面使用的命名元素的页面上的事件`handledEventsToo` `true`。

trans-unit.source: This handler would be invoked even if another element along the route marked the shared event data as handled before reaching the handling element in the route.
trans-unit.target: 将调用此处理程序，即使在路由过程的另一个元素标记为已处理之前已到达路线中的处理元素共享的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: The event route that handlers are added to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其添加处理程序的事件路由。

trans-unit.source: The event data that is used to add the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 用于添加处理程序的事件数据。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> property of the arguments to create the handlers.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用参数的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.RoutedEvent" /> 属性来创建处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds handlers to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> event handler collection.
trans-unit.target: 将处理程序添加到当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.EventRoute" /> 事件处理程序集合的指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" /> 中。

trans-unit.source: Use this method for content host elements (regardless whether they implement <xref:System.Windows.IContentHost>) in order to add handlers for the content host child elements to the host <xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于内容主机元素 (无论它们是否实现<xref:System.Windows.IContentHost>) 才能将内容主机子元素的处理程序添加到主机<xref:System.Windows.EventRoute>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此元素能否用作拖放操作的目标。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素可用作拖放操作的目标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 拖放操作默认情况下，不启用和必须通过设置有意启用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> or any other base element class.
trans-unit.target: 除了此基本设置，拖放行为完全是特定的实现，并且未定义的<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>或任何其他类，该类。

trans-unit.source: Certain controls, for example, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>, do have a default behavior, but no <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes have such a behavior.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些控件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>，默认行为，但不是具有<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>派生的类具有此类行为。

trans-unit.source: For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 拖放的详细信息，请参阅[拖放概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> overrides the metadata for this dependency property in its implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> 重写在其实现此依赖项属性的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> designates that this property allows property value inheritance (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A> is `true` in metadata).
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>指定此属性允许属性值继承 (<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Inherits%2A>是`true`元数据中)。

trans-unit.source: Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A> assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a local value), then the value from that parent element is assigned to all unassigned child elements by the property system.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中的属性值继承意味着，如果有任何其他值的子元素<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A>通过本地值或样式，最接近的父元素的值与此值分配 （也是在样式，默认情况下分配值或本地值），则该父元素中的值通过属性系统分配给所有未分配的子元素。

trans-unit.source: This means that you can specify whether to allow drop operations at the root element and then propagate the value to all <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> child elements that have not specifically assigned it a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着你可以指定是否允许拖放操作的根元素处，然后传播到所有的值<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>具有不专门为其分配的值的子元素`false`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example sets <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例设置<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop%2A>中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AllowDrop" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 将动画应用到此元素的指定依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the property to animate.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The animation clock that controls and declares the animation.
trans-unit.target: 控制和声明动画的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 将动画应用到此元素的指定依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Any existing animations are stopped and replaced with the new animation.
trans-unit.target: 任何现有动画均停止并替换为新动画。

trans-unit.source: To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要从属性中移除动画，指定为该属性的标识符`dp`并指定`clock`作为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 这将删除动画和动画的属性设置为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时钟的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性。

trans-unit.source: The animation clock that controls and declares the animation.
trans-unit.target: 控制和声明动画的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 枚举的一个值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />, which will stop any existing animation and replace with the new one.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />，这会停止任何现有动画并将其替换为新动画。

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to a specified dependency property on this element, with the ability to specify what happens if the property already has a running animation.
trans-unit.target: 向此元素的指定依赖属性应用动画，并且可以指定当该属性已有正在运行的动画时所要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要从属性中移除动画，指定为该属性的标识符`dp`并指定`clock`作为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 这将删除动画和动画的属性设置为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时钟。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时钟的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素上是否至少捕获了一次触摸。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素上至少捕获了一次触摸，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesCaptured" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is captured to this element or to any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上是否至少捕获了一次触摸。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is captured to this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上至少捕获了一次触摸，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesCapturedWithin" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素上是否至少按下了一次触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素上至少按下了一次触摸设备，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesDirectlyOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上是否至少按下了一次触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if at least one touch is pressed over this element or any child elements in its visual tree; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在此元素或其可视化树中的任何子元素上至少按下了一次触摸设备，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.AreAnyTouchesOver" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Starts an animation for a specified animated property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动动画。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate, which is specified as a dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性，它被指定为依赖项属性标识符。

trans-unit.source: The timeline of the animation to start.
trans-unit.target: 要启动的动画的时间线。

trans-unit.source: Starts an animation for a specified animated property on this element.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动动画。

trans-unit.source: When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 当你检查属性是否动画处理时，请注意动画将开始，并被视为非动画的起始点以外的第一帧呈现时进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>为`animation`是`null`，然后将删除当前的任何动画，并且保持的属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 如果整个`animation`值是`null`、 从属性中移除所有动画和属性值将恢复为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时间线。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时间线中的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: The property to animate, which is specified as the dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 要进行动画处理的属性，它被指定为依赖项属性标识符。

trans-unit.source: The timeline of the animation to be applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的动画的时间线。

trans-unit.source: A value of the enumeration that specifies how the new animation interacts with any current (running) animations that are already affecting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 一个枚举值，用来指定新动画如何与已在影响属性值的任何当前（正在运行的）动画进行交互。

trans-unit.source: Starts a specific animation for a specified animated property on this element, with the option of specifying what happens if the property already has a running animation.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素的指定要进行动画处理的属性启动特定的动画，并可以指定当该属性已有正在运行的动画时所要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 当你检查属性是否动画处理时，请注意动画将开始，并被视为非动画的起始点以外的第一帧呈现时进行动画处理。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>为`animation`是`null`，然后将删除当前的任何动画，并且保持的属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value.
trans-unit.target: 如果整个`animation`值是`null`、 从属性中移除所有动画和属性值将恢复为其基值。

trans-unit.source: However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped.
trans-unit.target: 但是，不会停止最初关联的动画时间线。

trans-unit.source: Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 分配给该时间线中的任何其他动画将继续运行。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the mouse to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将鼠标强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕获了鼠标，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` before you call <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`之前调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A>返回`true`，然后<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCapturedChanged> events are raised, with <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> in the event data reported as the element where the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A>返回`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsMouseCapturedChanged>引发的事件，与<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>在事件数据报告为元素其中<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureMouse%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If you force capture, you might interfere with existing captures—especially with captures that relate to drag-and-drop with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 如果强制捕获时，你可能干扰现有捕获-尤其是在具有与拖放与鼠标相关的捕获。

trans-unit.source: To clear mouse capture from all elements, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with the `element` parameter provided as `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除从所有元素的鼠标捕获，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.Capture%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与`element`参数作为提供`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example captures the mouse or releases capture, based on whether the mouse is already captured by the element.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例捕获到鼠标或释放捕获，基于是否由该元素已捕获鼠标。

trans-unit.source: Note that this example casts the prospective capture target element to the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> interface, and is thus initially calling the <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.CaptureMouse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 请注意此示例将转换到的潜在捕获目标元素<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>接口，并因此最初调用<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement.CaptureMouse%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Casting to <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> is a technique that is useful if you are unsure whether the element you want to have capture the mouse is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>是一种技术，如果您不确定的元素你想要捕获鼠标是否有用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: The interface cast and the interface method call then calls the appropriate type-specific CaptureMouse implementation internally without requiring a trial cast to either <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 接口 cast 和接口方法调用然后调用适当的特定类型的 CaptureMouse 实现内部而无需强制转换为一个试用版<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>或<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>。

trans-unit.source: This same casting technique works for other members that <xref:System.Windows.IInputElement> defines, for instance many of the input-related events, and other input-related methods.
trans-unit.target: 此相同的强制转换技术适用于其他成员，<xref:System.Windows.IInputElement>定义，例如许多输入相关的事件和其他与输入相关的方法。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of the stylus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将触笔强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stylus is successfully captured; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功捕获了触笔，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation based on the underlying default stylus device always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 始终根据基础默认触笔设备的默认实现返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: However, if you are extending the input devices that provide the device implementation for the input system, it is possible to create a system with an alternative stylus device implementation that might return different results.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你要扩展提供在输入系统的设备实现的输入的设备，则可能与一个备用的触笔设备实现，可能会返回不同的结果中创建系统。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the stylus is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使触笔超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 通常，将触笔捕获仅在拖放操作过程。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method calls an underlying static <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus> method <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法调用基础静态<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus>方法<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.Capture%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The actual capture behavior is implemented by the active stylus device implementation.
trans-unit.target: 由活动的触笔设备实现实现实际捕获行为。

trans-unit.source: To be captured, an element must be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 若要捕获，必须启用一个元素。

trans-unit.source: Check whether <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A> is `true` return before you call <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureStylus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 检查是否<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A>是`true`返回你在调用之前<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureStylus%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureStylus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A> is also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureStylus%2A>返回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsStylusCaptured%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: The device to capture.
trans-unit.target: 要捕获的设备。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to force capture of a touch to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将触摸屏输入强制捕获到此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified touch is captured to this element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将指定触摸屏输入捕获到此元素，则为 <see langword="true" /> ；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureTouch%2A> will return `false` if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is currently captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureTouch%2A> 将返回`false`如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>当前捕获到另一个元素。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureTouch%2A> returns `true`, then the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CaptureTouch%2A>返回`true`，则<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotTouchCapture>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: To release capture of a single touch from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A> method and specify the touch device to release.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放的单个触摸从此元素的捕获，请使用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.ReleaseTouchCapture%2A>方法并指定要释放的触摸设备。

trans-unit.source: To release all touches from this element, use the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放所有触摸从此元素，请使用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.ReleaseAllTouchCaptures%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="touchDevice" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects that are associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此元素关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 所有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> enables command handling of a specific command for this element and declares the linkage between a command, its events, and the handlers that are attached by this element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>启用此元素的特定命令的命令处理并声明命令、 其事件，以及此元素附加的处理程序之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: Another typical way to populate the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CommandBindings%2A> collection is to use <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> methods programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 另一种典型的方法来填充<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CommandBindings%2A>集合是使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>方法以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreCommandBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>元素。

trans-unit.source: Each of these should have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A> attribute set to a known command, and attributes set for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> handler implementations.
trans-unit.target: 每个都应当有<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Command%2A>属性设置为所知的命令，并且属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.CanExecute>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>处理程序实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information see <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag target.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现以此元素为拖动目标的基础拖动事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class, so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件对于此类，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 冒泡

trans-unit.source: Delegate
trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter>.
trans-unit.target: 对应的隧道事件<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewDragEnter>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnDragEnter%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnDragEnter%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the drag origin.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现以此元素为拖动起点的基础拖动事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Routed Event Information
trans-unit.target: 路由事件信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Routing strategy
trans-unit.target: 路由策略

trans-unit.source: Bubbling
trans-unit.target: 冒泡

trans-unit.target: 委托

trans-unit.source: The corresponding tunneling event is <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave>.
trans-unit.target: 对应的隧道事件<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewDragLeave>。

trans-unit.source: Override <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnDragLeave%2A> to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 重写<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnDragLeave%2A>实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave" /> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragLeave" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag event with this element as the potential drop target.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现以此元素为可能放置目标的基础拖动事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs even if the drag originates in the element bounds.
trans-unit.target: 如果即使拖动源自于元素边界，则会发生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If the drag starts outside the bounds and then moves inside, this event is also raised, as well as <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter> and related preview events.
trans-unit.target: 如果拖动的范围之外启动，然后将移动内，也会引发此事件，以及<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragEnter>和相关预览事件。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.DragOver>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现将此元素作为放置目标的基础放置事件时发生。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to set focus to this element.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将焦点设定到此元素上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus could be set to this element; <see langword="false" /> if this method call did not force focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘焦点可设定到此元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果此方法调用未强制设置焦点，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To be focusable, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A> must both be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 可获得焦点，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A>必须都是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Note that nearly all <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> derived classes are not <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A> by default.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，几乎所有<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>派生的类不是<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable%2A>默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 即使元素是特定的树中的焦点并已启用，事件处理，（例如，用于复合控件） 可能会响应预览焦点事件通过不允许焦点，因此此方法将返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical.
trans-unit.target: 焦点通常由两个不同的概念： 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点，并不总是相同。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 此方法设置逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: There is no programmatic means to set keyboard focus specifically; keyboard focus is determined by user input.
trans-unit.target: 没有专门; 设置键盘焦点的编程方法由用户输入确定键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md) and [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)和[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: If calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A> returns `true`, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A> are also `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>返回`true`，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin%2A>也`true`。

trans-unit.source: If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>, one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target), <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus> (source is the new focus target).
trans-unit.target: 如果相关的属性不是已`true`，则在调用<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>，一个或多个以下事件将按照以下顺序引发： <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewLostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewGotKeyboardFocus> （来源为新的焦点目标）， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged>， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>，<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.LostKeyboardFocus>， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus> （来源为新的焦点目标）。

trans-unit.source: The following example is a page-loaded event handler that finds a specified named paragraph in the document and sets focus to it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例查找指定的命名文档中的段落的页面加载事件处理程序，并将焦点设置到它。

trans-unit.source: Paragraphs are not focusable by default; this particular paragraph had a style applied (not shown) that used a style <xref:System.Windows.Setter> to make it focusable.
trans-unit.target: 段落不是默认设置。 可获得焦点此特定段落已应用了样式 （未显示），使用一种样式<xref:System.Windows.Setter>以使其可获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element can receive focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示元素能否得到焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is focusable; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该元素可获得焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Only the focused element receives keyboard input.
trans-unit.target: 具有焦点的元素收到键盘输入。

trans-unit.source: Certain derived classes might override metadata for this dependency property such that the derived class is focusable by default.
trans-unit.target: 某些派生的类可能会重写此依赖项属性的元数据，以便派生的类是默认情况下可获得焦点。

trans-unit.source: When inherited by <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> or its derived classes, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> overrides the metadata for this dependency property and redefines the default value of this property to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 当通过继承<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>或其派生的类，<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>重写此依赖项属性的元数据，并重新定义为此属性的默认值`true`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a style that makes a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph> focusable by default and gives it a visual behavior when it receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建一种使方式<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Paragraph>默认情况下可获得焦点并在接收焦点时为其提供可视行为。

trans-unit.source: When you derive from <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />, consider whether you want your element to be focusable, because by default it will not be focusable.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />，应考虑是否需要您可获得焦点，因为默认情况下它将不能获得焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: If you want your element to be focusable, override the metadata for this property in your derived class static constructor as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使元素可获得焦点，重写此属性在你派生的类的静态构造函数的元数据，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: where <paramref name="myElement" /> is the class name of the type that you are overriding the metadata value on.
trans-unit.target: 其中<paramref name="myElement" />是会重写元数据值的类型的类名称。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focusable" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The.dependency property to check.
trans-unit.target: 要选中的依赖属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the base property value for the specified property on this element, disregarding any possible animated value from a running or stopped animation.
trans-unit.target: 为此元素上的指定属性返回基属性值，忽略任何可能来自正在运行或已停止的动画的动画值。

trans-unit.source: The property value as if no animations are attached to the specified dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 就像没有动画被附加到指定的依赖属性一样的属性值。

trans-unit.source: If no animations are attached to the property, then the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GetAnimationBaseValue%2A> return value is always identical to the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> return value.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有动画被附加到属性，则<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GetAnimationBaseValue%2A>返回值也始终等于<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>返回值。

trans-unit.source: If there are animations attached, then all possible animation derived values including the start and stop values are ignored, and the property value is determined based on all other possible inputs.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有附加的动画，然后所有可能的动画派生值包括开始和停止值将被忽略，并确定基于所有其他可能的输入属性值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns an alternative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] parent for this element if no visual parent exists.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，如果不存在可视父级，则返回其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父级。

trans-unit.source: An object, if implementation of a derived class has an alternate parent connection to report.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生类的实现具有要报告的替代父级连接，则为一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认虚拟实现返回`null`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> provides a practical implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> 提供实际实现。

trans-unit.source: Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.
trans-unit.target: 备用父级是用于路由事件，在其中元素创建备用父级结构，以便其事件路由偏离到标准的父级的可视化树向上路由的标准模式的方式的情况下或向下预览路由策略。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.
trans-unit.target: 在输入系统报告出现涉及此元素的基础拖放操作时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback> event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback>事件允许拖动事件，以便为用户可视反馈提供拖放操作期间修改鼠标指针的外观的源。

trans-unit.source: The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process.
trans-unit.target: 视觉反馈用于强调拖放操作正在进行。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GiveFeedback>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.GiveFeedback?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素获得逻辑焦点时发生。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果有意通过某个方法调用强制焦点，而前一个键盘焦点位于不同的范围内，则逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A> method is called still gets logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，键盘焦点将保持其所在的元素的和其中<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>调用方法仍获取逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A> property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此事件的更精确地解释是它时引发的值<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused%2A>路线中的元素的属性更改从`false`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，接收到焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际获得焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotFocus" /> 路由事件。

trans-unit.source: Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered.
trans-unit.target: 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event.
trans-unit.target: 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use these identifiers to add class handlers.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about registering routed events, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.Windows.EventManager.RegisterClassHandler%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素聚焦于键盘时发生。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event is raised in many of the same circumstances.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusedChanged> 是一个类似事件，跟踪中维护的一个元素; 的焦点状态的属性的状态更改<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus>在很多相同的情况下引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有焦点的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定实际具有焦点的元素中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotKeyboardFocus>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.GotKeyboardFocus?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素捕获鼠标时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 在元素捕获鼠标，它会接收鼠标输入，即使在鼠标指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获，并且将保持捕获，直到发生拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>在事件数据以确定实际的元素具有鼠标捕获。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建一个别名<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加此类事件，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotMouseCapture>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Mouse.GotMouseCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this element captures the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素捕获触笔时发生。

trans-unit.source: When an element captures the stylus, it receives stylus input even if the pointer is outside its bounds.
trans-unit.target: 当元素捕获触笔时，它会接收触笔输入，即使在指针位于超出界限。

trans-unit.source: The stylus is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and retains capture until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 触笔通常仅在拖放操作期间捕获和捕获之前发生拖放操作的状态将保持。

trans-unit.source: Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached.
trans-unit.target: 由于此事件使用冒泡路由，具有捕获的元素可能是而不是元素的子元素实际附加事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A> in the event data to determine the actual element that has capture.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>事件数据以确定已捕获的实际元素中。

trans-unit.source: This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotStylusCapture> is part of the class members list when <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> is inherited as a base element.
trans-unit.target: 此事件创建此类的附加事件的别名，以便<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotStylusCapture>摘自类的成员列出时<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>为该类继承。

trans-unit.source: Event handlers that are attached to the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotStylusCapture> event are attached to the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.GotStylusCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType> attached event and receive the same event data instance.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序附加到<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.GotStylusCapture>事件附加到基础<xref:System.Windows.Input.Stylus.GotStylusCapture?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加事件，并接收相同的事件数据实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has any animated properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此元素是否具有任何进行动画处理的属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has animations attached to any of its properties; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有附加到其任何属性的动画，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` either for persistent (unclocked, always-running) animations or for animations that have a specific timeline.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`为永久性 （无时间限制，始终运行） 动画或具有特定的时间线的动画。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of input bindings that are associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此元素关联的输入绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings.
trans-unit.target: 输入绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices.
trans-unit.target: 输入的绑定支持命令来输入设备的绑定。

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> implements input bindings that include properties that are specific to mouse devices.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>实现的输入包括特定于鼠标设备的属性的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The collection of input bindings includes both input bindings that pertain to the type and also input bindings that are declared on the instance.
trans-unit.target: 输入绑定的集合包括同时适用于类型的输入的绑定和输入声明的实例的绑定。

trans-unit.source: A related property, <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CommandBindings%2A>, maintains a collection of command bindings.
trans-unit.target: 相关的属性， <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.CommandBindings%2A>，保持命令绑定的集合。

trans-unit.source: These bindings differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands and class-specific handlers for them.
trans-unit.target: 这些绑定从输入绑定不同，因为它们表示下一个级别的命令处理的操作为它们依赖于已知的命令和特定于类的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 属性元素用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreInputBindings*

trans-unit.source: One or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> elements (typically the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> derived classes).
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding>元素 (通常<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>或<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>派生类)。

trans-unit.source: Each of these is expected to have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute set.
trans-unit.target: 其中每个都应<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Command%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.Gesture%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this element is enabled in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中启用了此元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了该元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a style that includes a property setter that gives an alternate visual behavior when a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> is set to <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A> `false`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建包含提供备用 visual 行为的属性 setter 的样式时<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>设置为<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled%2A> `false`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> property on this element changes.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that becomes the return value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值成为派生类中 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了该元素，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property caches the value and also calculates whether the parent element of this element is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认实现缓存的值，并还计算是否启用此元素的父元素。

trans-unit.source: (If the parent is not enabled, the child element cannot be effectively enabled in practical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].) If you choose to override this implementation, make certain that you call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.
trans-unit.target: (如果未启用父，子元素不能有效地启用中实际[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。)如果你选择重写此实现，请确保调用基实现来保留此行为。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsEnabled" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether this element has logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定此元素是否具有逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has logical focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有逻辑焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序中有多个焦点分支，例如，菜单的内容和应用程序的其余部分之间，逻辑焦点将与键盘焦点可能会与不同。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，键盘焦点仅可在应用程序 UI 的一个元素，但是，其他焦点分支中的某些元素仍可能保留逻辑焦点。

trans-unit.source: For more information on logical focus, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)和[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsFocused" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an input method system, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)], is enabled for processing the input to this element.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用一个输入法系统（如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)]），以便用于处理此元素的输入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an input method is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入法处于活动状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the underlying attached property is <see langword="true" />; however, this value is influenced by the state of input methods at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 基础附加属性的默认值是<see langword="true" />; 但是，此值会影响在运行时的输入法状态。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value that is returned by the attached property <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the currently enabled input methods (keyboard, speech, and other input devices).
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的附加属性返回的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的当前已启用输入法 （键盘、 语音和其他输入的设备）。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this element has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示此元素是否具有键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素具有键盘焦点，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> property changes on this element.
trans-unit.target: 在此元素的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> 属性值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件中，不是路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocused" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether keyboard focus is anywhere within the element or child elements.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示键盘焦点是否位于元素或子元素内的任意位置。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if keyboard focus is on the element or its child elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果键盘焦点在元素或其子元素上，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Changes to the value of this property typically raise the <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event, unless a derived class has overridden <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A> to suppress the event.
trans-unit.target: 更改此属性的值通常引发<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>事件，除非派生的类已重写<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnIsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged%2A>以禁止此事件。

trans-unit.source: You do not set this property directly, but you can set the focus to the element by calling <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>, or by making a <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MoveFocus%2A> request.
trans-unit.target: 不能直接，设置此属性，但你可以通过调用将焦点设置到元素<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.Focus%2A>，或通过使<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.MoveFocus%2A>请求。

trans-unit.source: Either of these method calls might change this property value.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法调用任一可能会更改此属性的值。
